file_insights.significance: Added comprehensive TypeScript type definition for inspection history/timeline events
file_insights.integration_points: Extends existing type system with event tracking capabilities, references User type

patterns_discovered.description: Implements comprehensive audit trail pattern with entityType, entityId, action, oldValues, newValues
Uses optional userId with nullable user relationship (userId?: string, user?: User)
Action field uses literal union type for specific allowed values

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Optional user relationship without userId guarantee
gotchas_discovered.description: userId is optional but user field implies a User relationship. Code must handle cases where userId exists without user object and vice versa
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Consider making userId required when user is present or vice versa, or add validation logic

gotchas_discovered.description: oldValues and newValues use Record<string, unknown> which loses type safety for specific inspection properties
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Could use more specific types per action or implement validation layer

gotchas_discovered.description: Hard-coded action literal union may need updates when new event types are needed
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Consider using enum or extracting to constant for easier maintenance

approach_outcome.quality: High - Well-structured interface with appropriate optional fields and type constraints
approach_outcome.efficiency: Efficient - Single focused change in correct location, integrated with existing types

recommendations.recommendation: Consider extracting action types to a const or enum to reduce duplication and improve maintainability
recommendations.rationale: Will reduce friction when adding new action types in future

recommendations.recommendation: Add validation or documentation for userId/user relationship expectations
recommendations.rationale: Current optional pattern could lead to runtime errors if consuming code assumes relationship

recommendations.recommendation: Add JSDoc comments explaining audit trail semantics and when oldValues/newValues are populated
recommendations.rationale: Will help consumers understand event tracking behavior
